projects.name: win95.ajf.me
projects.desc: Windows 95 emulated in the browser, thanks to the wonderful work of Emscripten, DOSBox, Em-DOSBox and browser engine contributors.

projects.name: Crockford Facts.org
projects.desc: A recreation of everyone's favourite Douglas Crockford biographical source.

projects.name: Firth
projects.desc: A work-in-progress functional, strongly dynamically-typed, concatenative stack-oriented programming language.

projects.name: Various PHP RFCs and patches
projects.desc: In particular: Closure::call, ZPP Failure on Overflow, Integer Semantics, Null Coalesce Operator, Unicode Codepoint Escape Syntax, and my biggest project so far: Big Integer Support. I also wrote an RFC for Scalar Type Hints. I quit in February 2015 but later came back (see blog). After returning, my Void Return Type RFC got in.

projects.name: PictoSwap
projects.desc: A Nintendo 3DS web app made as a homage to the now-defunct Nintendo Letter Box (aka Swapnote).

projects.name: Various Gang Garrison 2 contributions
projects.desc: Mostly behind-the-scenes stuff. As part of this I wrote Faucet HTTP, a Game Maker Language HTTP/1.1 implementation!

projects.name: manic.js
projects.desc: A Minecraft Classic client written in JavaScript using WebSocket and THREE.js.

projects.name: lunasync
projects.desc: A YouTube playlist-synchronising chatroom written in JavaScript using node.js and WebSocket

projects.name: schnitzelVerse
projects.desc: A multi-user visual chatroom formed as an offshoot of ponyplace, with user-uploadable 2D avatars, a world made up of infinitely-sized rooms decorated with user-generated content, having its own (non-turing-complete) scripting language. Written in JavaScript using node.js and WebSocket

projects.name: ponyplace
projects.desc: A multi-user visual chatroom with animated 2D avatars, shopping system, accounts, multiple rooms, customisation, etc. Written in JavaScript using node.js and WebSocket

projects.name: SchnitzelCraft/SchnitzelCraft0
projects.desc: A very poorly written (I was inexperienced) Minecraft Classic server written in C using WinSock and zlib
